name: Sloanishness (Diana) - 80/10/10 Superwash Merino/Cashmere/Nylon Fingering
description: This MCN blend is deliciously soft and will be fabulous for any next to the skin projects. This is an experimental colorway that will have no recorded recipe and no specific color blend will be repeatable. Dyed in groups of 4 skeins, each group will be unique and different from the next. Colorway: Sloanishness Yardage: 375 yards Composition: 80/10/10 Superwash Merino/Cashmere/Nylon Care Instructions:a Machine washable but hand wash and lay flat to dry. Colors may vary from monitor to monitor so skeins may look slightly different in person though I take great care to present the most accurate images I'm able to. This yarn comes from a smoke free and animal free environment.

name: The Curse of the Tomgallons (Diana) - 80/10/10 Superwash Merino/Cashmere/Nylon Fingering
description: This MCN blend is deliciously soft and will be fabulous for any next to the skin projects. This is a very difficult colorway to capture accurately. It's a rich blood red splattered with deeper, blackish red. Colorway: The Curse of the Tomgallons Yardage: 375 yards Composition: 80/10/10 Superwash Merino/Cashmere/Nylon Care Instructions:a Machine washable but hand wash and lay flat to dry. Colors may vary from monitor to monitor so skeins may look slightly different in person though I take great care to present the most accurate images I'm able to. This yarn comes from a smoke free and animal free environment.

name: An Unmanageable Heroine (Anne) - 100% Superwash Merino Fingering
description: Soft and strong with a tight twist, this versatile fingering weight is perfect for any sock weight project. A deep royal purple with pops of blue and violet. Colorway: The Haunted Woods Yardage: 400 yards Composition: 100% Superwash Merino Care Instructions:a Machine washable but hand wash and lay flat to dry. Colors may vary from monitor to monitor so skeins may look slightly different in person though I take great care to present the most accurate images I'm able to. This yarn comes from a smoke free and animal free environment.
